question_content.description:
### Problem14
A shadow in a Java data type implementation refers to which of the following?

**Choices:**

%s

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Yantao Mei
choices: a. Two constructors with the same name
b. An instance method with the same name as a static method
c. A local variable with the same name as an instance variable
d. An instance variable with the same name as a constructor
e. An instance method with the same name as a constructor
